title: Purchase Complete!
author: ccvb1231
txt_content:
Thank you for purchasing Minecraft! Your status should update within the hour.
Receipt
Please save this information, it is useful if you were ever to contact support.
Upon processing your payment a receipt regarding the transaction will be sent by e-mail, please store this information as well.
ACCOUNT

求翻译

收據
請保存此信息，它是有用的，如果你曾經與支持部門聯繫。
在處理您的付款收據，有關交易將通過電子郵件發送，請以及存儲這些信息。
